  • Constructor Details

    • MySQL

      public MySQL(String url, String user, String password)
      Parameters:
      url - the url to connect to
      user - the username
      password - the password

    • MySQL

      public MySQL(String ip, String database, String user, String password)
      Parameters:
      ip - the ip of the server with the database on it
      database - the database to connect to, set to "" if you don't want to use a specific database
      user - the username for database login
      password - the password for database login

  • Method Details

    • connect

      public MySQL.ConnectionResponse connect()
      Connect to the database
      Returns:
      Object containing the result (success, connection time, errors, the connection)

    • CREATE_DATABASE

      public MySQL.QueryResponse CREATE_DATABASE(String name)
      Create a new Database
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the new database
      Returns:
      a query response

    • DROP_DATABASE

      public MySQL.QueryResponse DROP_DATABASE(String name)
      Delete a Database
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the database
      Returns:
      a query response

    • BACKUP_DATABASE

      public MySQL.QueryResponse BACKUP_DATABASE(String database, String bak)
      Create a backup of a database
      Parameters:
      database - the database to make the backup from
      bak - the path to a .bak file where the backup will be saved
      Returns:
      a query response

    • CREATE_TABLE

      public MySQL.QueryResponse CREATE_TABLE(boolean ifNotExists, String name, MySQL.TableDataObject[] tableDataObjects)
      Create a new Table
      Parameters:
      ifNotExists - set to 'true' if the table should only be created if it doesn't exist
      name - the name of the table
      tableDataObjects - all the columns with their datatype
      Returns:
      a query response

    • DROP_TABLE

      public MySQL.QueryResponse DROP_TABLE(String name)
      delete a table
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the table
      Returns:
      a query response

    • INSERT

      public MySQL.QueryResponse INSERT(String table, MySQL.TableEntryPair[] entries)
      Insert a new object into a table
      Parameters:
      table - the table to insert the object into
      entries - the object (as key-value-pairs) to add to the database
      Returns:
      a query response

    • UPDATE

      public MySQL.QueryResponse UPDATE(String table, MySQL.TableEntryPair[] set, MySQL.TableEntryPair[] where)
      update an existing object in the database
      Parameters:
      table - the table, where the object is listed
      set - the keys and values to be changed
      where - the keys which have to be set to the values for the update to be applied
      Returns:
      a query response

    • DELETE

      public MySQL.QueryResponse DELETE(String table, MySQL.TableEntryPair[] where)
      Delete objects from a table
      Parameters:
      table - the table to delete the object(s) from
      where - keys, which have to be set to a specific value, for the element to be deleted
      Returns:
      a query response

    • SELECT

      public MySQL.QueryResult SELECT(String[] columns, String table, MySQL.TableEntryPair[] where)
      Select elements from the database
      Parameters:
      columns - a list of columns which should be selected from the database, null or empty to select everything
      table - the table to select the objects from
      where - a list of attributes which have to be set, for the element to be selected
      Returns:
      a query result

    • disconnect

      public void disconnect()
      Disconnect from the database
